title: ****3 Beds 2 Full Bath Home****
description:
Welcome to 2336 E Clearfield street in the beautiful Port Richmond area of Philadelphia. This 2 story row home is ready for immediate move-in and includes 3 Large Bedrooms and 2 full baths. As you enter the home, you are greeted by a large open floor plan, with high ceilings, accented by beautiful hardwood floor and a newly renovated kitchen with Whirlpool appliances, there is plenty of space to entertain and set up a dining table and chairs. The first-floor bathroom includes a shower and plenty of room for additional bathroom storage, while the second-floor bathroom includes a bathtub and shower and gorgeous tile. Bedrooms all include ceiling fans, closet space, and plenty of natural light. The fully finished basement has a washer and dryer and can be used as extra storage space, office space, additional living space or a guest bedroom. Outdoor features include a backyard space and a front porch as well. The home has been freshly painted and the owner has made some upgrades to the property. Comes with an ADT security system and outdoor camera, which the tenant is responsible for to activate. 2336 E Clearfield is centrally located minutes from Fishtown, Rivers Crossing Shopping Center, Taconelli’s Pizza, Walmart, Easy access to Septa stops, mins from the Subway and the entrance to the 95 so the city is easily accessible. No pets, NO smoking, and NO drama! There is a 300$ non-refundable cleaning deposit along with security deposit, first month's rent, and last month's rent. 3 People Max Occupancy.
Tenants must have renters insurance min of a $100,000 coverage, tenants are responsible for snow removal, weeding of side walk, back yard and no trash is allowed to be stored on the front porch. Tenants are also responsible for replacing HVAC filters every 60 days and for typical maintenance. Each Tenant must apply and pay application fee. Comes with an ADT security system which the tenant is responsible for to activation and monthly fees. NO PETS, NO SMOKING, NO DRAMA

description:

Property Address
815 S 49th St | Apt 1 | Philadelphia, PA 19143
Available: Now
Offered By
Brighton House |  show contact info
Description
This is a beautiful newly renovated two bedroom apartment with a large professionally landscaped garden and private laundry room in a classic West Philly Victorian house. This sunny apartment has large windows on three sides providing natural light from southern and western exposures. There is an open kitchen and dining area with access to the backyard, a large bedroom with a bay window and lots of closet space, a fully renovated brand new marble tiled bathroom, living room and second bedroom. The kitchen has a new stainless steel dishwasher and refrigerator, large gas range, quartz countertops and zero radius sink. The apartment has beautiful original refinished hardwood floors throughout. There is a private laundry and basement storage room with lots of extra storage space and a utility sink. The apartment has both hot water radiator heat and HVAC heat and air conditioning. This is a great West Philly location, just off Baltimore Avenue and within a couple blocks of the Gold Standard Cafe, Vietnam Restaurant, Dock Street Brewing, Little Baby's Ice Cream and the Mariposa Food Co-Op, Loco Pez, and much more. Street parking is plentiful as is public transportation. The trolley runs along Baltimore Ave. which also has bike lanes running both directions into Center City. Send us a message with any questions or to schedule a time to come see it.

title: This home is a DREAM city-dwelling, through and through!
description:
AMAZING, NEW, LUXURIOUS - three words to describe this tri-level condo unit in a spectacular location in Fishtown. This home is a DREAM city-dwelling, through and through! Located on the first floor, so carrying in groceries & bags is a BREEZE. Enter into the unit to find an expansive open first floor with top of the line amenities. You'll absolutely love the modern kitchen with Carrera style counter tops, stand alone island with ample seating, and stainless steel appliances. Floor to ceiling windows in the living/dining room combination allow for an extra sun-soaked space. Through the sliding glass doors you'll find an EXTRA LARGE outdoor space that is RARE in the city. The space includes an expansive deck and patio furniture for entertaining friends and your furry loved ones. This is a dog-owners DREAM space! Upstairs you'll find a powder room, perfect for guests to use when you're entertaining. On the top floor is a SPACIOUS bedroom with walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. The shower is spacious and includes a bench. This bathroom is totally updated with modern finishes, and the bedroom is big enough for a sleeping space AND an office. On the way downstairs, you'll find extra storage containers - you won't run out of room in this city condo! Downstairs you'll find another extra large bedroom with a huge window for sunlight, which could also double as a sleeping space + office - or even a home gym! Double closet and another ensuite bathroom are included down here. This space is PERFECT for roommates, as you'll each have extra privacy and your own bathrooms. The laundry room is also located downstairs, with a newer washer/dryer. This home is walking distance to Frankford Avenue and all Fishtown has to offer. Penn Treaty park is directly across the street (did we say dog-friendly?!) -- and street parking is a breeze around here as no permits are required! This one is hard to beat - schedule your showing today!

title: Renovated 1 BR Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 915 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 9th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, and The Continental Mid-town. Savor a coffee at La Colombe. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or a turkey club with fries at Marathon on the Square. Buy scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Indulge in a decadent weekend brunch at Green Eggs. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mutter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: All apartments offer Brazilian oak hardwood flooring
description:
The all-new Piazza Alta has been designed from the ground up to be a truly elevating city living experience. We offer studios to penthouses in a variety of layouts and stunning finishes. All apartments offer Brazilian oak hardwood flooring, oversized windows allowing abundant natural sunlight, ceiling fans in every room, washer/dryer in unit, plenty of closet space. Kitchens include custom cabinetry with soft-close drawers throughout, quartz counters, slab backslashes and mood setting under cabinet lighting. Bathrooms feature an exhilarating waterfall rain shower head with hand-held spray wands and body jets, shower benches and glass doors, illuminated medicine cabinets and storage vanities. Apartments can be found in the dark modern scheme Sleek design, the bright contemporary Scandinavian design or the warm Timeless design. There is absolutely no wrong way to live luxurious. Now let’s talk amenities. First, to say we have a pool would be modest. The Aqua Foro pool club is a 25k sq ft rooftop aquatic paradise. Lap and lounge pools, hot tubs, kitchens, cabanas and even a splash pad for the kids. Our 15k sq ft fitness and recovery center features state of the art equipment, Peloton bikes, a massive outdoor terrace, and residents can enjoy regular complimentary trainer-led fitness classes. Also, the fitness center offers relaxing “his and her” spas with high pressure showers, dry saunas, steam rooms, stand up tanning, and hydro massage beds. If you're looking for a refreshing atmosphere to finish up some work at home or meet up with friends look no further than our 5k sq ft cafe & lounge area. Enjoy a cup of coffee at the stylish diner booths, kick back on a comfortable couch with friends or take in beautiful city views from the outdoor terrace. Located in the beating heart of Northern Liberties just steps away from supermarkets, restaurants, bowling alleys, live music and comedy club venues. A few minutes from nearby highways granting quick and easy access to concerts, sporting events, shopping malls and everything downtown center city has to offer. From sunrise to sunset The Piazza Alta delivers a luxurious and invigorating lifestyle. Take the first step towards your own dream space by visiting us today. *LIMITED TIME PROMOS AVAILABLE. Beautifully renovated loft in the heart of the Loft District - available NOW! As you walk into this unit you are instantly greeted by tall windows that allows sunlight to pour in. title: Call this 3-bedroom, 1-bath Bella Vista gem home!
description:
Call this 3-bedroom, 1-bath Bella Vista gem home! Blending vintage original details with a recent renovation and upgrades throughout, this home is on a quiet, postcard-perfect block that is just steps away from some of the city's best offerings. The first floor features two rooms that can be used interchangeably as either living or dining rooms depending on your preference, followed by a separate eat-in kitchen with enough space for a breakfast table. With Carrara marble floors and detailing, stainless steel appliances, a durable quartz countertop, and a decorative iron-lattice window, this kitchen is both spacious and well-appointed. Stairs lead up to the second floor where a roomy guest bedroom with its own closet, a renovated bathroom, and an extra open space that easily be used as an office, playroom, or den, with a convenient linen closet await. The large master bedroom with closet and a charming second guest bedroom top off the property on the third floor. Remote controlled ceiling fans and mid-century-style fixtures in the 3 bedrooms and living spaces add smart, efficient flare paired with contemporary hardware and original inlaid floors. Washer and dryer are provided in the unfinished basement, which also has plenty of room for storage. Four AC units are also provided for the renter's convenience. This residential family-friendly block is convenient to schools, as well as Whole Foods and Acme supermarkets, the 9th Street Market, and South Street. Saloon Restaurant and brunch favorite Fitzwater Cafe are right around the corner, as is John's Water Ice, Fiorella, Nomad Pizza, The Good King, Rally Coffee Shop, and so many more places to explore.
708 Clymer St

title: We offer studios to penthouses in a variety of layouts
description:
The all-new Piazza Alta has been designed from the ground up to be a truly elevating city living experience. We offer studios to penthouses in a variety of layouts and stunning finishes. All apartments offer Brazilian oak hardwood flooring, oversized windows allowing abundant natural sunlight, ceiling fans in every room, washer/dryer in unit, plenty of closet space. Kitchens include custom cabinetry with soft-close drawers throughout, quartz counters, slab backslashes and mood setting under cabinet lighting. Bathrooms feature an exhilarating waterfall rain shower head with hand-held spray wands and body jets, shower benches and glass doors, illuminated medicine cabinets and storage vanities. Apartments can be found in the dark modern scheme Sleek design, the bright contemporary Scandinavian design or the warm Timeless design. There is absolutely no wrong way to live luxurious. Now let's talk amenities. First, to say we have a pool would be modest. The Aqua Foro pool club is a 25k sq ft rooftop aquatic paradise. Lap and lounge pools, hot tubs, kitchens, cabanas and even a splash pad for the kids. Our 15k sq ft fitness and recovery center features state of the art equipment, Peloton bikes, a massive outdoor terrace, and residents can enjoy regular complimentary trainer-led fitness classes. Also, the fitness center offers relaxing his and her spas with high pressure showers, dry saunas, steam rooms, stand up tanning, and hydro massage beds. If you're looking for a refreshing atmosphere to finish up some work at home or meet up with friends look no further than our 5k sq ft cafe & lounge area. Enjoy a cup of coffee at the stylish diner booths, kick back on a comfortable couch with friends or take in beautiful city views from the outdoor terrace. Located in the beating heart of Northern Liberties just steps away from supermarkets, restaurants, bowling alleys, live music and comedy club venues. A few minutes from nearby highways granting quick and easy access to concerts, sporting events, shopping malls and everything downtown center city has to offer. From sunrise to sunset The Piazza Alta delivers a luxurious and invigorating lifestyle. Take the first step towards your own dream space by visiting us today. *LIMITED TIME PROMOS AVAILABLE. title: Studio Apartment Home with City View on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck
description:
The studio apartment home at 507 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 5th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 17, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, Ritual Shoppe, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, and The Continental Mid-town. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Pick up warm cookies from Insomnia Cookies. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Pick up a selection of scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theatres. Wander around the Mutter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views

* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.

* Large north-facing windows

Perfect for 1 or 2 people. 2BR, 1 BA with skylight, LR, DR, small kitchen, original refinished pine floors throughout, basement for storage with laundry, newer windows, front porch, gorgeous back deck and patio, perennial gardens, raised bed planters, new roof and freshly painted neutral colors, 2 private off-street parking spaces. title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

From the abundance of cabinet and counter space to the high-end SS appliances, including: a dishwasher, built-in microwave, refrigerator, and a gas stove-this contemporary kitchen will inspire your culinary talents. Access a large patio area from the kitchen so entertaining is easy during BBQ season. Possibility awaits below, wherein a finished basement with a flexible attitude seems to also make room for all your extra baggage with additional storage space, as well as a separate laundry room-with a full-sized washer and dryer, bedroom and half bathroom.
The 2nd floor boasts 2 bedrooms on opposite sides with a beautiful fully tiled bathroom in between. Continue up the stairs to the master suite taking up the entire 3rd floor. Continue to go up and you arrive at the very large roof deck with 360 degree views of the city.
Located in the up and coming Brewerytown section of Philadelphia, this part of town gets more exciting almost every day. Local to i-76, and surrounded by public transportation routes! Keeping it local is just as easy with a quick walk to Girard Ave. for a slice of pie at Pizza Dad’s or a house brew at Crime & Punishment! This neighborhood as so much to offer!
